name: Flyboy '64 (Free Preview)
description:
Flyboy '64 is a one player game for the Commodore 64. You can play the game on original hardware or on a pc/mac by using an emulator. 

AIM OF THE GAME:
The game depicts a hang-glider, Flying Jack, gliding in the sky. While gliding over land and sea, Jack must avoid obstacles on land and in the sky. The only way to defend yourself when enemies are getting to close is to start kicking, and hopefully you can kick down the stunt pilots flying around you. As he glides along he must pick up letters in correct order (B first, O second etc.). In the end of the level he must land on a platform.

CONTROLS:
Control the hanglider with a joystick in port two. Press firebutton to start kicking.

CREDITS:
Programming by Eric Hilaire
Graphics by Roy Widding
Developed by Megastyle during the period 2016-2018

IMPORTANT:
Flyboy '64 is based on the arcade game Flyboy aka Fast Freddie from 1982.  The commodore 64 version you have here is only a preview, and you are not playing a finished game. Most graphic and code is WIP, and music/sound is not existing. The loading picture (also WIP) displayed on this itch page is not enclosed in the file you can download. As this is a preview, we can not guarantee that the game is free for bugs.

Developing  this game was decided to be stopped 07.04.2018 due to lack of motivation. The project is cancelled and will not be continued in the future. 

If you want more information about this game, visit GTW 64
